document_title: What is erectile dysfunction? Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: yeu-sinh-ly.json_6_What should you eat and abstain from erectile dysfunction to improve?
subsection_content:
In addition to treatment and the use of daily support products, many people ask about their nutritional regimen, as well as what they should eat and avoid to improve. To have strong health and maintain good form in bed, men need to eat nutritious food, prioritize foods rich in vitamins and minerals, drink enough water every day, then you need to pay attention to the "list" The following should and should not be foods:
Foods to eat: Seafood (shrimp, crab, fish, oysters, snails...), dark chocolate, watermelon, nuts, eggs, beets, figs.; Foods to avoid: Fried foods, greasy foods, foods high in salt, sweets, stimulants, alcohol, cigarettes...
See more: What should men with erectile dysfunction eat and avoid?
Gentlemen should prioritize food groups that help enhance men's physiology
